comment._content: I think the painter realized later on in the process that he needed to shorten the name "San Franciso"  Otherwise it would say "Philly to Frisco".

comment.author: 37515705@N04
comment._content: It´s intersting that nobody is smiling. Only one cheaky boy has a grin in the face. From driver`s head to the left (over the belly of the officer) - and there he is.

comment._content:
"It´s intersting that nobody is smiling."'

That's because a police officer showed up.

comment._content: frisco was a common name back then,  none of the hangups most ppl have with "Frisco" today.
